cast.original_title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom
cast.overview: After arriving in India, Indiana Jones is asked by a desperate village to find a mystical stone. He agrees – and stumbles upon a secret cult plotting a terrible plan in the catacombs of an ancient palace.
cast.title: Indiana Jones and the Temple of Doom

details.biography: Lorraine Doyle, best known for being one of Benny Hill's "Hill's Angels" was born in 1958. In 1991 and 1993 she had two daughters, Rebecca and Lauren, with her husband Vincent, a Jewler. She retired from show business in 1993 in order to raise her family. In 1998 she and her husband opened their own Jewlery shop in London where they live.  - IMDb Mini Biography
details.name: Lorraine Doyle
